https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iALSypN3MhC6kBVwc9VpuJUlm1j.jpg Down the road from Woodstock in the early 1970s, a revolution blossomed in a ramshackle summer camp for disabled teenagers, transforming their young lives and igniting a landmark movement. Crip Camp: A Disability Revolution
